import React from "react"; function Timeline() { const height = '60%' const elems = document.getElementsByClassName("ag-timeline-item_box") window.addEventListener('scroll', function (){ var scroll = window.scrollY - 140 var idx = Math.floor(scroll / 220) idx = Math.min(4,idx) if(idx >= 0 && idx < 4 ){ for (let i = 0; i <= idx; i++) { console.log(i) elems[i].classList.add("active") } } }); return(
Timeline

2022

2024

Master in Cyber Security in collaboration with ETHZ - 2024/2025

) } export default Timeline;
